desc: Trellys Outdoor Adventures - Hire a Canoe in Shepparton and go explore the Goulburn River. Book online today or call 0488775477 to organise canoe hire . Sheppartons waterways are full of activities to entertain yourself and the famil, Pack some lunch and enjoy the spectacular bird life, swimming beaches and fishing.

layout.text:
At Trelly's Outdoor we have been "talking" about the outdoors for over 20 years!
But now we want to SHOW you the outdoors.
Let us take you on a Canoe Adventure on the Goulburn River in our home town of Shepparton, Victoria.
Prices start at $25 per hour with a minimum of 2 people!
